name: Ace Wing (epayzer)
description:
Stardate 2020. It is spring time in the Earth system. I found myself with more free time but not much to do so I decided to learn how to make a video game. This game started out as a tribute to Rogue Squadron (one of my favorite old school games). The game eventually ended up with a lot of additional video, movie, and tv show sci fi references. See if you can catch ‘em all!

NOTE: Xbox controller/gamepad on PC is supported. Mouse and keyboard is also supported. Keyboard only is also supported but not recommended.
